shippingstore

Class Drum

  • java.lang.Object
    • shippingstore.PackageOrder
      • shippingstore.Drum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class Drum
extends PackageOrder
    This class is a specialized representation of a package order, specific to drums. There are only getter methods and no setter methods and as a result an drum package cannot be mutated once initialized. A drum package order object can also call the two override methods via inheritance from PackageOrder toString() and equals()
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drum

        public Drum(java.lang.String trackingnumber,
            java.lang.String specification,
            java.lang.String mailingclass,
            java.lang.String material,
            int diameter)
        This constructor initializes the drum object. The constructor provides no user input validation. That should be handled by the class that creates a drum object.
        Parameters:
        trackingnumber - a String that represents the tracking number
        specification - a String that represents the specification. Specification: Fragile, Books, Catalogs, Do-not-Bend, N/A - one per package
        mailingclass - a String that represents the mailing class Mailing class: First-Class, Priority, Retail, Ground, Metro.
        material - a String that represents the material the drum is made from: Plastic or Fiber
        diameter - an int that represents the diameter of the drum in inches

    • Method Detail

      • getMaterial

        public java.lang.String getMaterial()
        This method returns the drum's material
        Returns:
        a String that is the drum's material.

      • getDiameter

        public int getDiameter()
        This method returns the drum's diameter
        Returns:
        an int that is the drum's diameter in inches.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method returns the drum's fields as a string representation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class PackageOrder
        Returns:
        a String that lists the fields of the drum object delineated by a space and in the same order as the constructor
